{}.response: The 'List of Regions' API provides a comprehensive overview of the geographical areas covered by our news source tracking for articles related to energy prices. This list is essential for users who are interested in understanding the scope of our news aggregation and want to filter or search for news by specific regions. You can expect to receive a detailed array of regions, which may include continents, countries, states, or even cities, depending on the granularity of our news source tracking system. This enables you to tailor your analysis of energy price news to regions that are relevant to your research, investments, or policy-making decisions.
